messages.content:
You are a Google Drive data generator for a workplace benchmark. Your job is to generate realistic Drive file data based on scenario information.

The output must be valid JSON matching the Drive schema with:
- files: array of {id, name, mimeType (optional), content (optional text excerpt), modifiedTime (optional)}

Generate Drive files that reflect:
- Events from sub_scenarios_expanded (core scenario events, e.g., documents, reports)
- Events from noise_scenarios (unrelated workplace files)
- Respect noise_level: 0 = minimal noise, 1 = lots of unrelated files
- Respect depth: 0 = direct/obvious files, 1 = indirect/multi-step file references

You must output ONLY valid JSON matching the schema. Do not include markdown code fences.

raw_message.content:
{
  "files": [
    {
      "id": "file_web_planning_sync_agenda_notes",
      "name": "WEB Website Redesign – Planning Sync Agenda & Notes",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.document",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-03T09:45:00+09:00",
      "content": "WEB Website Redesign – Planning Sync
Date: 2025-11-04
Time: 10:00–11:00 JST
Location: Zoom
Attendees: Alex Smith (PM), Jordan Johnson (Engineer), Sam Williams (Senior Engineer), Taylor Brown (Lead Engineer), Casey Jones (Designer)

Objective
Align on Website Redesign (WEB) milestones and scope ahead of the Planning milestone on 2025-11-10.

Proposed Agenda
1. Review current WEB issues
   - WEB-100: Website Redesign - Initial Setup (Status: Done)
   - WEB-101: Website Redesign - Core Feature (Status: In Progress)
2. Confirm scope for the Planning milestone (2025-11-10)
3. Review overall timeline
   - Planning: 2025-11-10
   - Development: 2025-11-20
   - Launch: 2025-11-30
4. Identify owners and next steps

Notes (to be filled during meeting)
- Decisions:
- Action items & owners:
- Open questions:

Context
This document supports the calendar event "WEB Website Redesign – Planning Sync" scheduled for Tuesday, 2025-11-04, 10:00–11:00 (JST)."
    },
    {
      "id": "file_web_planning_milestones_overview",
      "name": "WEB Website Redesign – Milestones Overview",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.spreadsheet",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-03T09:20:00+09:00",
      "content": "Project: Website Redesign (WEB)

Milestones
Name, Date, Description
Planning, 2025-11-10, Finalize scope and priorities for WEB-100, WEB-101 and related issues
Development, 2025-11-20, Implement agreed scope for core Website Redesign features
Launch, 2025-11-30, Public launch of the redesigned website

Jira Issues (seed)
Issue Key, Summary, Status
WEB-100, Website Redesign - Initial Setup, Done
WEB-101, Website Redesign - Core Feature, In Progress

Notes
- Used as reference for the "WEB Website Redesign – Planning Sync" on 2025-11-04, 10:00–11:00 JST.
- Alex owns milestone alignment; engineering leads to confirm feasibility during the planning sync."
    },
    {
      "id": "file_web_planning_invite_brief",
      "name": "WEB Planning Sync – Invite Details",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.document",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-03T09:42:00+09:00",
      "content": "WEB Website Redesign – Planning Sync (Invite Brief)

Organizer: Alex Smith (alex.smith@company.com)
Attendees: Jordan Johnson, Sam Williams, Taylor Brown, Casey Jones

Calendar Title: "WEB Website Redesign – Planning Sync"
Date: Tuesday, 2025-11-04
Time: 10:00–11:00 JST (60 minutes)
Location: Zoom

Description (for calendar event)
60-minute planning sync for the Website Redesign (WEB) project.

Attendees: Alex Smith (PM), Jordan Johnson (Engineer), Sam Williams (Senior Engineer), Taylor Brown (Lead Engineer), Casey Jones (Designer)

Agenda:
- Review WEB milestones (Planning 2025-11-10, Development 2025-11-20, Launch 2025-11-30)
- Discuss current issues (WEB-100, WEB-101)
- Confirm scope and owners for Planning.

Reference
- Slack confirmations in #web-redesign on 2025-11-03, 09:32–09:36 JST, where all invitees confirmed that 10:00–11:00 JST on 11/4 works.
- Initial email proposal from Alex on 2025-11-03, 09:15 JST titled "Planning sync for Website Redesign (WEB)"."
    }
  ]
}
